content: तूलः --लं [तूल्-अच्] Cotton. --लं {@--1@} The atmosphere, sky, air. {@--2@} A tuft of grass. {@--3@} The mulberry. {@--4@} The panicle of a flower or plant. {@--5@} The thorn-apple. --ला {@--1@} The cotton tree. {@--2@} The wick of a lamp. --ली {@--1@} Cotton. {@--2@} The wick of a lamp. {@--3@} A weaver's fibrous stick or brush. {@--4@} A painter's brush. {@--5@} The Indigo plant.
